page.title: 01LIVINGSTON NEW TOWN
page.content: Within the last twenty years this part of Central Scotland has changed dramatically. Where fields and farms once were we now have a new town with a vast industrial area. The area of Knightsridge is mainly owned and rented out by Livingston Development Corporation but there are a few owner occupied houses. The amenities are limited and the shopping precinct consists of only a few shops. Houston Industrial Estate is the main industrial area in Livingston and was also the first to be built.The M8 motorway lies to the north of the estate and affords easy access to local businesses.
